scripts.token: asc --transform json-as/transform assembly/token.ts --target release --exportRuntime --textFile build/token.wat --binaryFile build/token.wasm
scripts.helloworld: asc --transform json-as/transform assembly/helloworld.ts --target release --exportRuntime --textFile build/helloworld.wat --binaryFile build/helloworld.wasm
scripts.tokenspender: asc --transform json-as/transform assembly/tokenspender.ts --target release --exportRuntime --textFile build/tokenspender.wat --binaryFile build/tokenspender.wasm
scripts.create_token: node massa_tools/include_base64.js assembly/create_token.ts && asc --transform json-as/transform assembly/create_token.m.ts --target release --exportRuntime --textFile build/create_token.wat --binaryFile build/create_token.wasm && rm assembly/create_token.m.ts
scripts.test_tokenspend: node massa_tools/include_base64.js assembly/test_tokenspend.ts && asc --transform json-as/transform assembly/test_tokenspend.m.ts --target release --exportRuntime --textFile build/test_tokenspend.wat --binaryFile build/test_tokenspend.wasm && rm assembly/test_tokenspend.m.ts
scripts.sendMessage: yarn run receiveMessage && node massa_tools/include_base64.js assembly/send_message.ts && asc assembly/send_message.m.ts --target release --exportRuntime --textFile build/send_message.wat --binaryFile build/send_message.wasm && rm assembly/send_message.m.ts
